item.title: Full Three-dimensional Particle-In-Cell Simulation for Phase-matched Ion-based High-order Harmonic Generation in Water-window X-ray

item.title: Numerical experiment of phase-matched ion-based high-order harmonic generation in the water-window x-ray spectral region via electromagnetic envelope equation
item.description: “Numerical experiment of phase-matched ion-based high-order harmonic generation in the water-window x-ray spectral region via electromagnetic envelope equation”, Optics Express, 2024 https://doi.org/10.1364/OE.529410
